ModMetaData.name: Rimocracy
ModMetaData.author: Garwel
ModMetaData.description:
Rimocracy brings domestic politics to the RimWorld.
The colony can now have a leader, chosen in one of many ways, who governs thereby improving efficiency of all citizens. You can move your country towards a liberal democracy, an oppressive dictatorship or something in-between, but make sure that you have enough public support for your reforms. Maintain loyalty of your citizens to ensure they tolerate the less popular decisions and stay clear of protesting.
